results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = n^2 + n*k + k^2, 1 <= k <= n.
comment: First subdiagonal T(k+1,k) = A003215(k), the centered hexagonal numbers. Second subdiagonal T(k+2,k)=  A003215(k)/2 + A003215((k+1)/2. Third subdiagonal T(k+3,k) = A003215(k)/3 + A003215((k+1)/3 + A003215(k+2)/3 and so on. - _Avi Friedlich_, May 26 2015
